headerDisplay:
Sensors have to be flashed before adding to remove the encryption. Please use this tool to flash: https://pvvx.github.io/ATC_MiThermometer/TelinkMiFlasher.html

Check plugin readme for more info.

name.title: Sensor Name
name.description: This is the name the sensor will use in HomeKit

address.title: MAC Address
address.description: Get the MAC Address from the flashing tool, or by using bluetoothctl scan le
